errorCategory.title: Cabin Bag Max. Weight 8kg
errorCategory.shortUserDesc: Cabin bag should not have more than 8kg weight.

messages.messageMain:
Assertion: The weight of cabin luggage is 8kg or less.
                Error Information: The cabin luggage of Jane Grant exceeds the maximum weight allowance by 2kg. Pack lighter!
messages.messageAssertion: The weight of cabin luggage is 8kg or less.
messages.messageDiagnosticsAll: The cabin luggage of Jane Grant exceeds the maximum weight allowance by 2kg. Pack lighter!

errorCategory.title: Cabin Bag Max. Depth 24cm
errorCategory.shortUserDesc: Depth of cabin bag should not exceed 24cm.

tags.descText: Everything related to the luggage dimensions.

messages.messageMain:
Assertion: The depth of cabin luggage is 24cm or less.
                Error Information: The cabin luggage of Jane Grant exceeds the maximum depth allowance by 1cm. Get something with less depth!
messages.messageAssertion: The depth of cabin luggage is 24cm or less.
messages.messageDiagnosticsAll: The cabin luggage of Jane Grant exceeds the maximum depth allowance by 1cm. Get something with less depth!
